{{Description|It's that time of the year again! This year's [[Lantern Rite Festival|Lantern Rite]] is sure to be super lively. Hehe, [[Paimon]]'s so excited!<br>Ahem! Then let Paimon be the one to say it:<br>Traveler, how about we take a trip back to [[Liyue Harbor]] together? Who knows, we might just stumble upon something wonderful~}}
'''May Fortune Find You: Spring's Premonition''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* Fortune's Coming - Daily Login Event: 2025/01/22 04:00 - 2025/02/11 14:59
* "Old Memories, New Beginnings" - Lantern Rite Gifts: 2025/02/01 00:00 until the end of Version 5.3

===Requirements===
* Fortune's Coming - Daily Login Event: Adventure Rank 5 or above
* "Old Memories, New Beginnings" - Lantern Rite Gifts: Adventure Rank 2 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, the "Fortune's Coming - Daily Login Event" and "'Old Memories, New Beginnings' - Lantern Rite Gifts" will be available. The rewards include: [[Primogem]]s &times;1,600, [[Intertwined Fate]] &times;10, [[Crown of Insight]], [[Sanctifying Elixir]], etc.
* Each mail can be collected until the end of the '"Old Memories, New Beginnings' - Lantern Rite Gifts" event. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
